rows.label: qst004101_msg0001
rows.name: Hey! What are you doing over there?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0002
rows.name:
...I see. You want to
salvage a Filament Globe.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0003
rows.name:
I had heard you could get them
at this salvage point, but...

rows.label: qst004101_msg0004
rows.name:
That was a while ago. Apparently,
they're not so common lately.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm not sure if they've all
been collected or if the Cloud
Sea currents have changed...

rows.label: qst004101_msg0006
rows.name:
Now it's a valuable salvaged
item, and it's hard to
find on the market.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0007
rows.name: What, you want one that badly?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0008
rows.name:
In that case... I'll share one
of the Filament Globes I have.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0010
rows.name:
Could you take care of討伐
some Revenge Tirkin for me?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0011
rows.name:
A ferocious one has settled
in the Tirkin Turf and is
attacking anyone who passes by.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0012
rows.name:
Hearing how ferocious it is,
I was a bit hesitant...

rows.label: qst004101_msg0014
rows.name:
Three Revenge Tirkin
have been confirmed.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0015
rows.name:
Let me know when you've
defeated them. I'll give
you the Filament Globe then.
